recipes.description: This dish combines fluffy scrambled eggs with tender potatoes and melted cheese for a comforting and satisfying breakfast. The addition of colorful peppers adds a pop of flavor and texture.

sub_steps: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add the diced potatoes to the skillet and cook until tender and lightly browned, about 10 minutes.
Remove the cooked potatoes from the skillet and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk the eggs with salt and black pepper.
In the same skillet used for the potatoes, add the diced peppers and sauté for 2 minutes until softened.
Pour the beaten eggs into the skillet and cook, stirring constantly, until the eggs are scrambled and cooked to your desired consistency.
Remove the skillet from heat and stir in the shredded cheese until melted.
Add the cooked potatoes to the skillet with the scrambled eggs and gently mix until well combined.
Transfer the cheesy scrambled eggs with potatoes to plates and serve hot.
Enjoy your delicious cheesy scrambled eggs with potatoes!

recipes.description: This hearty sandwich features tender steak and melted cheese sandwiched between fluffy biscuits. It's a delicious and satisfying option for breakfast, brunch, or even lunch.

sub_steps: In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium-high heat.
Add the thinly sliced steak to the skillet and cook until browned and cooked to your desired level of doneness, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Transfer the cooked steak to a plate and set aside.
Preheat the oven according to the biscuit package instructions.
Bake the biscuits until golden brown and cooked through.
Remove the biscuits from the oven and let them cool slightly.
Slice the baked biscuits in half horizontally.
Place a portion of the cooked steak on the bottom half of each biscuit.
Top the steak with shredded cheese.
Place the top half of each biscuit on top of the cheese to complete the sandwich.
Serve the steak and cheese biscuit sandwiches while the biscuits are still warm.
Enjoy your delicious steak and cheese biscuit sandwiches!

recipes.description: This indulgent potato casserole is loaded with cheese, making it the perfect side dish for any meal or a comforting main dish on its own. The combination of potatoes, cheese, and butter creates a creamy and cheesy texture that is sure to please.

ingredients.optional_toppings: sliced green onions, cooked bacon bits, sour cream

sub_steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Grease a baking dish with butter or cooking spray.
In a large mixing bowl, toss the thinly sliced potatoes with melted butter, salt, and black pepper until well coated.
Layer half of the sliced potatoes in the greased baking dish.
Sprinkle half of the shredded cheese over the potatoes.
Repeat the layers with the remaining potatoes and cheese.
Cover the baking dish with foil and bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.
Remove the foil and continue baking for an additional 15-20 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the cheese is melted and golden brown.
Remove the casserole from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
Garnish the loaded cheesy potato casserole with sliced green onions, cooked bacon bits, and a dollop of sour cream, if desired.
Serve hot as a side dish or as a comforting main dish.
Enjoy your delicious loaded cheesy potato casserole!
